name: Alex Echo x Hydrow Limited-Edition Rower Collection

metadata.name: Four Elements #2
metadata.description: Alex Echo x Hydrow Limited-Edition Rower Collection - Four Elements #2 -- There are three designs to choose from and a very limited number of each to purchase. Each design (on both the rower and related NFT) is numbered and signed by the artist, so you can be sure of the exclusivity and uniqueness of this purchase.
